#summary An Introduction to the Create Object menu in the Admin CP
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

The Create Object menu is the first place to go to add new content to your site.


= Menu Items =

 *[CreateItem] - Add a new product
 *[CreateCategory] - Add a new product category
 *[CreateNewsPost] - Add a new news post
 *[CreateTechHelpPost] - Add a new technical tips post
